        public RegulatoryGraph newFrame()

      • newFrame

        public Frame newFrame​(Graph graph)
        Build a new frame for the given Graph by creating a suitable GraphGUI and memorize their relationship
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph for which a Frame is desired
        Returns:
        a new frame for the given Graph

      • newFrame

        public Frame newFrame​(Graph graph,
                      boolean can_be_saved)
        Build a new frame for the given Graph by creating a suitable GraphGUI and memorize their relationship
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph for which a Frame is desired
        can_be_saved - a boolean indicating if the graph associated to the frame can be saved or not
        Returns:
        a new frame for the given Graph

      • whatToDoWithGraph

        public void whatToDoWithGraph​(Graph<?,​?> new_graph)

      • whatToDoWithGraph

        public void whatToDoWithGraph​(Graph<?,​?> new_graph,
                              Graph<?,​?> parent_graph)
        Manage the action to execute on the new graph (that was generated from the parent graph). According to the size of teh graph, a WhatToDoWithGraph frame may be opened to ask user what he wants to do with the new graph.
        Parameters:
        new_graph - the graph to manage
        parent_graph - the graph from which the new graph was generated
